channel.title: How to make crosshair bigger?
channel.description:
I looked it up in the dev console but it only let me change color from there. It says in the wiki that it's font-driven and easily changeable. This is kinda cryptic... can anyone explain this further?
I want to change it because I don't really see anything on the surface.. changing to red helped as always but I would like it to be either bigger or thicker.

item.title: How to make crosshair bigger?
item.dc:creator: AngryMobTime
item.description:
I looked it up in the dev console but it only let me change color from there. It says in the wiki that it’s font-driven and easily changeable. This is kinda cryptic… can anyone explain this further?

I want to change it because I don’t really see anything on the surface… changing to red helped as always but I would like it to be either bigger or thicker.

Read full topic
